entry.title: Install Discord on Linux
entry.summary: When you divide gaming into two eras, then you get gaming before the advent of Discord and after the advent of Discord. It has changed how gamers used to communicate during a game. It’s not that there was no messaging app earlier, but Discord made it extremely easy to create communities and upgraded team communication very quickly. Today Discord has become a go-to app for team communications. ...

entry.title: How to use Reddit API?
entry.summary: Before, I get into the nitty-gritty technical details, i would like to talk about why use Reddit API. You could the following things: Automate messages related activites such as retrieve, compose and delete. Approve, add and delete friends. Tasks related to posts such as: Posts Edit Comments Downvote Live Thread Search for users, threads, sub...
